title: Apache CXF 漏洞曝光：存在拒绝服务与数据泄露双重风险（CVE-2025-48795）
title_translated: Apache CXF Gap Exposure: There is a double risk of denial of services and data disclosure (CVE-2025-48795)
summary: Apache CXF stores stream-based news into the local file system as a temporary file, leading to memory depletion (Denial-of-Service) attack and exposure of sensitive data in log files.

title: Chrome紧急更新，谷歌修复正遭活跃利用的关键零日漏洞
title_translated: Chrome's emergency update. Google fixes the critical zero-day loophole that is being used.
summary: A high-risk loophole related to verification deficiencies in non-reliability inputs in ANGE and GPU components, allowing attackers to obtain unauthorized access or execute malicious codes.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several loopholes in Microsoft Office may allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems.

title: Wing FTP Server Improper Neutralization of Null Byte or NUL Character Vulnerability
title_translated: Wing FTP Server Improper Neutralization of Null Byte or NUL Character Vulnerability
summary: Improper neutralization of null byte or NUL character vulnerability allows injection of arbitrary Lua code into user session files, leading to system command execution with elevated privileges.

title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
title_translated: Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
summary: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway, potentially leading to memory overread when configured as a Gateway or AAA virtual server.

title: Ubuntu: (CVE-2025-7345): gdk-pixbuf vulnerability
summary: A heap buffer overflow can occur during Base64 encoding, allowing out-of-bounds reads from heap memory, potentially causing application crashes or arbitrary code execution.

title: Ubuntu: (CVE-2025-6395): gnutls28 vulnerability
summary: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS, allowing an attacker to cause memory corruption and denial of service (DoS).
